tool_description: Get top news with Full Content globally, per topic or search local news from Google News in real-time.  Use this API to get the top news globally or per topic and search for news by query and geographic area.  Powered by Google News.
name: Real-Time Google News Full Text Content API
title: Real-Time Google News Full Text Content API
tool_name: Real-Time Google News Full Text Content API

api_list.name: Supported Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-google-news-full-text-content-api.p.rapidapi.com/getSupportedLanguage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-google-news-full-text-content-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-google-news-full-text-content-api.p.rapidapi.com/getSupportedLanguage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-google-news-full-text-content-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search news articles by keyword with an option to limit the results to a specific time range.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code. See all available country codes.
Default: US

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: Domain of the source from which to return news articles (e.g. cnn.com).

optional_parameters.name: news_count
optional_parameters.description:
Determines the maximum number of news to return. 
If you want to extract Full Text Content from URL, you should set it 5 or less. 
Default value is 5 if is_extracted is true, otherwise unlimited.

optional_parameters.name: is_extracted
optional_parameters.description: If you want to extract Full Text Content from News URL, you should set it 'true'.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - ISO 639-1 alpha-2.
Default: en.

optional_parameters.name: time_published
optional_parameters.description:
Find news articles published in a specific time range.
- h = hours (eg: 12h)
 - d = days (eg: 7d)
 - m = months (eg: 6m)
 - y = years (eg: 1y)

api_list.name: Top Headlines
api_list.description: Get the latest news headlines/top stories from country.

optional_parameters.name: news_count
optional_parameters.description: Max numbers of news should return. If is_extracted is 'true', it always return 5. Default is unlimited.

optional_parameters.name: is_extracted
optional_parameters.description: If you want to extract Full Text Content data from URL, set it 'true'.

api_list.name: Supported Countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-google-news-full-text-content-api.p.rapidapi.com/getSupportedCountries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-google-news-full-text-content-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://real-time-google-news-full-text-content-api.p.rapidapi.com/getSupportedCountries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-time-google-news-full-text-content-api.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Extract URL
api_list.description: Extract Full Text Content from given URL.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL for extracting full text data

api_list.name: Local Headlines
api_list.description:
Get local, geo based headlines.
E.g London,

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Area, city or country to fetch news for (e.g. London).

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Language code. (eg. en for English)
Default : en

optional_parameters.name: time_published
optional_parameters.description:
- h = hours (eg: 12h)
 - d = days (eg: 7d)
 - m = months (eg: 6m)
 - y = years (eg: 1y)

api_list.name: Topic Headlines
api_list.description:
Get the latest news headlines for a spesific topic :
Available topics:
WORLD
NATIONAL
BUSINESS
TECHNOLOGY
ENTERTAINMENT
SPORTS
SCIENCE
HEALTH

required_parameters.name: topic_name
required_parameters.description:
Available topic

WORLD
NATIONAL
BUSINESS
TECHNOLOGY
ENTERTAINMENT
SPORTS
SCIENCE
HEALTH

optional_parameters.name: is_extracted
optional_parameters.description: If you want to extract Full Text Content from URL, you should set it 'true'.

optional_parameters.name: news_count
optional_parameters.description: Maximum news count should return. If is_extract is 'true', you cant set it more than 5. Default is unlimited.
